title: New: Laura Mvula – Green Garden (S O H N Remix)
body:
We haven’t heard from the Vienna via London based producer **S O H N** for a little while now.

Despite his past silence there’s very much the feeling that 2013 will be his year. He returns today via this smooth interpretation of the **Laura Mvula** track, _Green Garden_, a great track in its own right, made arguably better by **S O H N** ‘s hand.

Hit play below.

He returns today via this smooth interpretation of the Laura Mvula track, Green Garden, a great track in its own right, \[…\]
